summary: This document is email correspondence between a U.S. Attorney's Office representative and a law clerk for Judge Alison J. Nathan regarding scheduling and procedural matters for case 20-cr-330. It includes the filing of a joint letter proposing a briefing schedule and a request for defense counsel to file notices of appearance.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: Presiding judge in case 20-cr-330, whose law clerk is sending orders and requests to counsel.

events.title: Initial Conference Scheduled
events.description: An initial conference is scheduled for this date in case 20-cr-330.

keyFacts: The document references case 20-cr-330, indicating ongoing legal proceedings in July 2020.
A joint letter proposing a briefing schedule was filed by the parties in connection with a July 14, 2020 initial conference.
Judge Alison J. Nathan, through her law clerk, requested that defense counsel file notices of appearance on the docket.
